TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpCacheVaryByParams extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供一种类型安全的方式来设置 属性。

span.span: Provides a type-safe way to set the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识当有多`Get`个`Post`缓存的资源响应时, ASP.NET 使用哪个 HTTP 或参数来唯一标识响应的变体。 The property identifies which HTTP `Get` or `Post` parameters ASP.NET uses to uniquely identify a variation of the response when there are multiple cached responses for a resource. 当响应依赖于一组客户端输入 (如标头或参数) 时, 这非常有用。This is useful when a response depends on a set of client inputs, such as headers or parameters. 与 HTTP 缓存控制标头不直接相关, 但可帮助确保客户端或代理因指定参数而异。The is not directly related to HTTP cache-control headers, but helps ensure that a client or proxy varies by the specified parameters. 有关的详细信息`VaryByParams`, 请参阅 RFC 2616:超文本传输协议-HTTP/1.1, 在[万维网联合会 (W3C)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)网站上提供。For more information about `VaryByParams`, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125) site. 有关完整的详细信息, 请参阅第14节 "标头字段定义"。See section 14, "Header Field Definitions", for complete details. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 从与关联的对象访问对象。The following code example demonstrates how the object is accessed from the object associated with an . [!code-csharp[Classic HttpResponse.Cache Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpResponse.Cache Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpResponse.Cache Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpResponse.Cache Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: if HTTP request parameters are ignored; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将属性设置为`true`等效于将资源的[@ OutputCache](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2)指令`VaryByParams`属性设置为 "无"。 Setting the property to `true` is equivalent to setting the [@ OutputCache](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2) directive `VaryByParams` attribute to "none" for the resource.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示缓存是否随指定的 HTTP 请求参数而变化。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cache varies according to the specified HTTP request parameter.

value.span: 如果缓存应该随指定的参数值而变化，则为 。

span.span: if the cache should vary by the specified parameter value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作为访问器 (getter) 使用时, 如果在当前参数集合中找到指定参数的值, 则索引器将返回`true` ; 如果集合设置为因 \* (星号) 而异, 则指示所有参数。When used as an accessor (getter), the indexer returns `true` if a value for the specified parameter is found in the current parameters collection, or if the collection is set to vary by \* (an asterisk), which indicates all parameters. 当用作赋值函数 (setter) 时, 索引器将参数集合中与指定的标头对应的参数的值设置为。 `true`When used as a mutator (setter), the indexer sets the value for the parameter in the parameters collection that corresponds to the specified header to `true`. 可以指定值 \* 来指示所有参数。The value \* can be specified, which indicates all parameters. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 从与关联的对象访问索引器。The following code example demonstrates how the indexer is accessed from the object associated with an . [!code-csharp[Classic HttpResponse.Cache Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpResponse.Cache Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpResponse.Cache Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpResponse.Cache Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
